sparse.eigenvolvers.java

Class OperatorPrecCG

  • java.lang.Object
    • sparse.eigenvolvers.java.Operator
      • sparse.eigenvolvers.java.EigPreconditioner
        • sparse.eigenvolvers.java.OperatorPrecCG

  • public class OperatorPrecCG
extends EigPreconditioner
    SEIG Java OperatorPrecCG class.

    This class sets up a conjugate gradient solver. The goal is to multiply the input block matrix, using operatorAction(DenseMatrix), by an approximate inverse to the operator T

    SEIG uses the MTJ Java library (matrix-toolkits-java) and Netlib Java (netlib-java) for numerical linear algebra and matrix computations.

    Author:
    Rico Argentati
